Yes, The Matrix Resurrections is definitely another highly anticipated movie in terms of special effects and visual innovation. The original Matrix movies introduced groundbreaking visual effects techniques, including the "bullet time" effect, which has since become a staple of action movies.

The new movie is expected to feature advanced martial arts and fight choreography, as well as new techniques in visual effects and animation. The filmmakers have also hinted at a more immersive and interactive viewing experience, with scenes that unfold in 3D and a "choose your own adventure" style approach to storytelling.

All of these new technologies and techniques are expected to take the franchise to new heights and offer viewers a truly unique and thrilling moviegoing experience.
